summary: BuildRequest contains no explicit requirements or acceptance criteria. The diff introduces multiple new/expanded frontend features and extensive backend type definitions that are not requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Profile setup and profile customization UI/workflow (new/expanded pages and logic)
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest, but diff modifies/introduces significant profile creation/customization functionality.

hallucinated_features.description: Large expansion of backend domain model types (events, chat, jokes, feedback, rewards, parental controls, games, AI behavior, etc.)
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest specifies no requirements; diff adds numerous new public types/constants suggesting new capabilities beyond any stated request.

hallucinated_features.description: Addition of many frontend type definitions for admin dashboard, badges, seasonal events, story/craft projects, chat, jokes, etc.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by BuildRequest; diff adds a large set of feature-related TypeScript interfaces/enums.

hallucinated_features.description: Implementation/claims of a Games Hub with 46 games, game layout features (trophy counter, upgrade dialog), and multiple game pages (BalloonPop, MemoryMatch, WordWizard, NumberRunner)
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by BuildRequest; described in the diff summary file as implemented features.

hallucinated_features.description: Events calendar notifications and localStorage-based event management
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by BuildRequest; described as an implemented page/feature.

hallucinated_features.description: 2D video generator with canvas animation, playback controls, and download
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by BuildRequest; described as implemented functionality.

hallucinated_features.description: Real-time chat page with online users list and instant messaging
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by BuildRequest; described as implemented functionality.

hallucinated_features.description: Jokes/riddles page with 1,000+ jokes, favorites, rating, submission, and parental approval workflow
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by BuildRequest; described as implemented functionality.
